title: This won't Last Long! Spacious 3bd2.5 Townhome
posting_body: ['Our Justin Ave property offers a lovely, landscaped center courtyard with pool and easy access to shopping, dining and walking distance to nearby Kenneth Village and gorgeous Brand Park.', 'Our 3 bedroom/2.5 bath apartment home is a beautiful fully renovated, second floor split level corner unit with living room, dining room, large kitchen, and 1/2 bath downstairs; 3 bedrooms and 2 full baths upstairs; beautiful views from the main and second levels; and large and ample storage/closet space.', 'Interior renovations include luxury plank flooring in the living areas, new plush carpeting in the bedrooms, all new stainless-steel appliances including refrigerator, glass ceramic-top range, microwave and dishwasher; beautiful stone granite countertops in the kitchen and bathrooms, new cabinets and fixtures throughout; as well as central air conditioning and heat with digital programmable thermostat.', 'THIS ONE WILL GO QUICKLY!!', '\xa0 CALL TO SCHEDULE A TOUR!', '-Assigned Off Street Parking', '-Laundry', 'In-Unit', '-Recycling', '-Ceiling Fans', '-Stainless Steel Appliances', '-Garbage Disposal', '-Close to Public Transportation', '-Easy Access to World Class Shopping & Dining', '-Luxury Plank Flooring', '-Plush', 'Carpeting', '-Modern Fixtures', '-Controlled Access/Gated', '-On-Site Management & Maintenance', '-Central A/C', '-Online Resident Portal', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'For more information, visit us at: <URL>']
